[Oportunidade 1]
Oportunidade: Senior Data Engineer

Sobre a vaga
About us 

Startup - Experienced Data Engineer 
Supply chain and logistics is going through a technological evolution and customer expectations around delivery have become more demanding. We are an AI startup solving the most complex problems in the $800bn trucking industry in the US. Our platform empowers trucking companies to operate efficiently and competitively in a rapidly changing marketplace. We are literally helping to move the world forward.

Who we are seeking 
As a Data Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining our data pipelines and ETL processes. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless data integration, transformation, and delivery. In addition to your ETL expertise, you will leverage your DevOps experience to optimize our data and software infrastructure, automate processes, and ensure scalability and reliability. You will be empowered to transform the technology stack to support the company growth plans. We are about building a strong organizational culture that values growth, learning, ownership, delivery, and collaboration. You'll be a critical part of a fast-growing startup with respect from day one.

What you‚Äôll do 
Design, develop, and maintain scalable ETL processes to extract, transform, and load large volumes of data from various sources into our data warehouse
Design, code, and execute on projects to improve the reliability and observability of the Everest overall software stack
Collaborate with stakeholders to understand data requirements and translate them into efficient ETL workflows
Collaborate with the engineering team to improve release and monitoring processes, automating whenever possible
Implement and maintain data pipelines using technologies such as AWS Glue, Apache AirFlow, and custom Python scripts
Build monitoring and alerting systems to proactively identify and resolve data pipeline and software issues
Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and best practices in data engineering, reliability engineering, ETL processes, and cloud technologies

The ideal candidate will have 
Proficient in english is a must 
5+ years of proven experience as a Data Engineer, working on complex ETL processes and data pipelines (or Master‚Äôs plus 2 year of relevant experience)
Strong proficiency in SQL and database technologies (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redshift)
Hands-on experience with cloud platforms, particularly AWS (e.g., S3, DynamoDB, Glue, Lambda, EMR, Redshift, CloudWatch)
Experience with workflow orchestration tools like Apache AirFlow
Proficiency in at least one programming language (Python preferred) for scripting and automation
Familiarity with DevOps practices and tools (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins) for building and managing data and software infrastructure
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills with a focus on data quality and reliability
Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams

Bonus points if you have 
Experience with data streaming technologies (e.g., Kafka, Kinesis)
Understanding of machine learning concepts and frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch)
Domain expertise in logistics or supply chain 

If you're really interested in this job, apply on Linkedin and send us an email with your resume to hello@useeverest.com.

Oportunidade: Senior Staff Data Scientist

Sobre a vaga

Procuramos uma pessoa para desenvolver solu√ß√µes de dados escal√°veis utilizando AI/Machine Learning. Fornecer orienta√ß√£o t√©cnica e lideran√ßa para colegas menos experientes, seguindo melhores pr√°ticas e buscando sempre solu√ß√µes simples e eficazes, reduzindo o esfor√ßo t√©cnico geral e mantendo a qualidade adequada.
Estabelecer parceria estreita com a lideran√ßa e colegas para compartilhar conhecimento, melhores pr√°ticas e eliminar a duplica√ß√£o de esfor√ßos.

O que esperamos de voc√™:

Mestrado ou doutorado em Ci√™ncia da Computa√ß√£o, Engenharia, ou √°reas afins.

[Oportunidade 4]
Oportunidade: Senior Data Architect

Sobre a vaga
Company Overview:
 Lean Tech is a rapidly expanding organization situated in Medell√≠n, Colombia. We pride ourselves on possessing one of the most influential networks within software development and IT services for the entertainment, financial, and logistics sectors. Our corporate projections offer many opportunities for professionals to elevate their careers and experience substantial growth. Joining our team means engaging with expansive engineering teams across Latin America and the United States, contributing to cutting-edge developments in multiple industries.
 Currently, we are seeking a Senior Data Architect with a strong English level to join our team. Here are the challenges that our next warrior will face and the requirements we look for: 
 Position Title: Senior Data Architect
 Location: Remote - LATAM
 What you will be doing:
 We are seeking a highly experienced Senior Data Architect. This role is critical in ensuring the seamless operation and optimization of their cloud and data warehouse environments. Your responsibilities will include: 
  Lead the design, implementation, and management of cloud architecture solutions, primarily utilizing Azure and Snowflake
Oversee the migration and optimization of data warehouses, ensuring high performance, scalability, and reliability
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions
Provide expert guidance and support in troubleshooting and resolving complex issues related to cloud and data warehouse infrastructure
Develop and implement best practices for data management, security, and governance. Continuously evaluate emerging technologies and integrate them into the architecture to enhance performance and cost-efficiency


Requirements & QualificationsTo excel in this role, you should possess:
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field
Relevant certifications in cloud architecture and data warehouse technologies (e.g., Azure Solutions Architect Expert, Snowflake SnowPro)
Minimum of 10 years of experience in cloud architecture and data warehouse management
Expert-level skills in Azure, with a proven track record of designing and implementing large-scale data warehouse solutions
Extensive experience in building and migrating data warehouses, with a deep understanding of the associated challenges and best practices
Knowledge of data integration tools such as Talend, Informatica, or Azure Data Factory
Familiarity with DevOps practices and tools for continuous integration and delivery
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work under pressure to meet tight deadlines
Exceptional communication skills, with the ability to articulate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders


Why you will love Lean Tech:
  Join a powerful tech workforce and help us change the world through technology
Professional development opportunities with international customers
Collaborative work environment
Career path and mentorship programs that will lead to new levels. 


Join Lean Tech and contribute to shaping the data landscape within a dynamic and growing organization. Your skills will be honed, and your contributions will be vital to our continued success. Lean Tech is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

[Oportunidade 5]
Oportunidade: Senior Data Scientist

Sobre a vaga
A Keyrus acredita na diversidade e na inclus√£o. Encorajamos a todos a participarem em nosso processo de contrata√ß√£o, n√£o importando o g√™nero, idade, ra√ßa, religi√£o. N√£o permitimos nenhum tipo de discrimina√ß√£o. Isto √© refor√ßado no processo de contrata√ß√£o e vivido dessa forma na empresa.

Sabemos que grandes resultados s√≥ s√£o alcan√ßados com uma grande equipe, por isso procuramos pessoas talentosas e apaixonadas, com desejo de crescer profissionalmente e criar uma trajet√≥ria de carreira conosco.

Pap√©is e Responsabilidades

Liderar a automa√ß√£o de processos, eliminando tarefas manuais e melhorando a efici√™ncia operacional.

Realizar an√°lises de dados e cria√ß√£o de modelos

Realizar conex√£o com bases de dados para an√°lise estat√≠sticas

Realizar a limpeza, manipula√ß√£o e an√°lise de dados para insights acion√°veis.

Desenvolver e manter pipelines de dados robustos e confi√°veis.

Colaborar com equipes multidisciplinares para entender as necessidades de dados e entregar solu√ß√µes eficazes.

Qualifica√ß√µes Essenciais

Experi√™ncia e conhecimento com Generative AI e Machine Learning;

Profici√™ncia em Python;

Implementa√ß√£o de pipelines de dados complexos;

Experi√™ncia com ferramentas de transforma√ß√£o de dados (Stack AWS);

Capacidade de resolu√ß√£o de problemas;

Ingl√™s Intermedi√°rio.

Qualifica√ß√µes Desej√°veis

Cria√ß√£o de cargas em PySpark, criando tabelas nas camadas "Raw", "Curated" e "Refined"; Utiliza√ß√£o de Jupyter, Python + Spark, Pandas e outras bibliotecas AWS;

Cargas na AWS, com S3 e Redshift;

Modelagem descritiva, modelagens preditivas e conhecimento para ado√ß√£o de Intelig√™ncia Artificial (LLM).

Nossa miss√£o √© Auxiliar as empresas a extrair todo o potencial de Dados e Digital objetivando aumentar seu desempenho, ajudando na transforma√ß√£o, gerando novas alavancas de crescimento e competitividade.

Vem fazer parte do Time Keyrus!
